title: Game Freeze at champion select on rank games
body: So this happened to me twice on rank games. The game is freezing all the time in champion select and making use lose Ip even though we see other people are still talking on the chat. We can't lock in our champions. Need to fix this problem because others are having the same problem.

replies.body: Freezing or crashing in champion select can happen for a few reasons, the biggest being the use of third party programs.  If you have any like play.tv or overlays running, remove all of it for the fix.  If you still have any issues, use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network is failing to stay connected and knocking you out of sync.  Hit me up if you have any questions!
